tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  appointment_date DATE,
  appointment_time TIME,
  client_name VARCHAR(50),
  reminder TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE appointment_schedule (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assistant_name VARCHAR(50),
    client_name VARCHAR(50),
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE reminders (
    reminder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assistant_name VARCHAR(50),
    reminder_description TEXT,
    reminder_date DATE,
    reminder_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME,
    client_name VARCHAR(50),
    appointment_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE reminders (
    reminder_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    reminder_date DATE,
    reminder_time TIME,
    reminder_message TEXT,
    client_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE assistants (
    assistant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    assistant_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    assistant_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    assistant_phone VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    assistant_specialty VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE assistants (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    specialization VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_appointments (
    user_id INT,
    appointment_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, appointment_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (appointment_id) REFERENCES appointments(id)
);
